explains: n. 挑战，难题；挑战书，比赛邀请；质疑，质询；喝停盘查
v. 挑战，向……下战书；质疑，拒绝接受；盘问，查问；考验
wordGroup: meet the challenge 迎接挑战；满足要求
rise to the challenge 接受挑战，奋起应付挑战
take up the challenge 应战
challenge cup 挑战杯；优胜杯；奖杯

sentences.en: Bill was stimulated by the challenge.
sentences.cn: 比尔受到该挑战的激励。

sentences.en: She beat off a challenge to her leadership.
sentences.cn: 她战胜了对她的领导地位的挑战。

sentences.en: I hope that he proves equal to the challenge.
sentences.cn: 我希望他最后能应付这一挑战。
